S4 E5

TV-MA L 44min | 2020

New Season Now Streaming

Following their secret rendezvous, Liz and Caleb find themselves on a case together, defending a soldier court-martialed for sabotaging the weapon of his superior officer. Lucca accompanies her client, and newly minted friend, Bianca, on a short but sure to be memorable trip to the Caribbean. (TV-MA L) Air Date: May 13, 2020
